column5: The modern newly remodeled “Tortuga Bay” Bay front Condo with private boat dock offers 2 Bedrooms, (Sleeps up to 6) 2 Full Baths, Resort Pool, Hot Tub, Breathtaking Bayfront Balcony, Full Size-Fully Equipped Kitchen, LCD TV’s, Wi-Fi , and so Much More than the Mind Can Conceive!  2 Bedrooms (2-Queen Beds, 2-Twin Beds) Bay front Balcony, Fully Equipped Kitchen, Washer and Dryer 3 LCD HDTV Broadband Internet and Wi-Fi throughout Resort Pool and Hot Tub  Private Boat Dock, Outstanding Bay Views
column8: Bay view condo with pool , boat dock sleeps 5-6
